text: we are the largest education group in
Malaysia focused on technology courses
for our students the challenges we've
been facing was infrastructure we were
using multiple technology as hypervisor
for our infrastructure our users were
complaining why the pace of innovation
and delivery is not as fast as it should
be so it's time for us to use cloud
technology we were able to innovate and
embed the latest available technologies
like machine learning api gateway s3
queue management system which relies on
AWS iot and lambda we've been looking at
Amazon go how customers they can walk
into a supermarket do their shopping and
leave their supermarket without any
problem and we were thinking it can't we
provide almost the same service to our
students by walking into the exam hall
so we built this application which is
using AWS recognition and a Raspberry Pi
as a hardware which is very cheap we are
able to implement that for our example
and our smart classroom which includes
Amazon Alexa and Amazon recognition 100%
of our mobile application back-end is
running on AWS lambda that means we do
not need to take care of any
infrastructure to serve our users
you
